mapper.insert: insert into personal_safety_protection_order (ID, NAME, CREATE_TIME, IS_SUBMIT, SERVICE_NO, STATUS, UPDATE_TIME, ORGANIZATION_ID, VIOLENT_CASE_ID, FACT_AND_REASONS) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isSubmit,jdbcType=BIT}, #{serviceNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{organizationId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{violentCaseId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{factAndReasons,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
